text: @SenTomCotton Let’s all just get real..we all know, including @senatemajldr  @SenTomCotton @LindseyGrahamSC @JohnBoozman and ENTIRE #GOP KNOW Donald Trump is an unprepared imbecile. YOU KNOW IT, AND THEY KNOW IT. This disastrous #COVID19 response is killing US citizens and is THEIR FAULT 100%!
